Name: Narrow-Mouthed Flask of Saint Minas
Description: The flask, or bottle, has a narrow mouth and a narrow cylindrical neck. The body is circular and flattened. On each side of the body of the bottle, Saint Minas is portrayed standing in prayer. He wears a cloak and at his feet two camels are kneeling.There are two crosses around the saint's head in the upper part of the scene. The whole scene is surrounded by a raised circle and a circle made by dots.
